pluralName.description: The plural name for the entity. Will be guessed by NOX if not specified.

relatedParents.description: The related parent entities (one-to-many relationship from parent).

schema.description: The database schema that this entity will be persisted in (default 'dbo')

table.description: The name of the database table that this entity will be persisted in

attributes.description: A list of attributres of the entity

messaging.description: A list of messaging providers to which this entity will submit events
